MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:45pm. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05 PM on Wednesday, 21 April 2021.
